```python
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

Partition = 'Holidays', 'Eating_Out', 'Shopping', 'Groceries'                   # <1> 
sizes = [250, 100, 300, 200]

fig1, ax1 = plt.subplots()                                                      # <2> 
ax1.pie(sizes, labels=Partition, autopct='%1.1f%%', shadow=True, startangle=90) # <2>          
ax1.axis('equal')

plt.show()                                                                      # <3> 
```
